actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend titles 10 and 32, United State Code, to authorize additional medical and dental care and other related benefits for Reservists and members of the National Guard, under certain conditions.

summary.text: Reserve Forces Benefits Act - Entitles specified reserve members of the uniformed services and members of the National Guard to the same medical and dental benefits enjoyed by members of the uniformed services on active duty. Entitles the dependents of such individuals to the same medical and dental benefits presently available to the dependents of members on active duty under specified circumstances.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles 10 and 32, United State Code, to authorize additional medical and dental care and other related benefits for Reservists and members of the National Guard, under certain conditions.
